page.title: 20Robertsbridge-future
page.content: With the building of the By-pass and the electrification of the railway line the future of this area is bright. Many more people are likely to move into the region and industry could be persuaded to set-up in and around the village. Religion will still play a major part in the life-style of the village. It is thought that the population will increase sharply mainly along the line of the By-pass. Although all these changes may occur it is hoped that the customs of village life will not be lost.
